title.native: 異世界魔王と召喚少女の奴隷魔術Ω
title.romaji: Isekai Maou to Shoukan Shoujo no Dorei Majutsu Ω
title.english: How NOT to Summon a Demon Lord Ω

description:
The second season of Isekai Maou to Shoukan Shoujo no Dorei Majutsu.

Diablo is back! You know…the Demon Lord from another world? Traveling through the woods with Rem and Shera, they encounter a lone girl in tatters, pursued by a powerful Paladin.

You know what that means—Diablo will have to try and hide his lack of social skills once again (and come to her rescue, of course). Let the enchanting adventures continue!

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: Isekai Maou to Shoukan Shoujo no Dorei Majutsu 2

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Virtual World
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

tags.name: Hikikomori
tags.description: Prominently features a character who withdraws from social life, often seeking extreme isolation.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Large Breasts
tags.description: Features a character with larger-than-average breasts.

node.description:
__[Profile (Scoop)](https://www.scoop.co.jp/creator/detail.php?cd=21)__

__Yousuke Yamashita__ is a Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger and keyboardist.

**Birthplace:** Osaka Prefecture, Japan

**Katou Yuusuke** is a Japanese lyricist, composer and arranger.

[Website](https://yu-serizawa.com/) | [Profile (81 Produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=229) | [Profile (i☆Ris)](https://iris.dive2ent.com/profile/member.php?id=1000226) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/@iRis_s_yu) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/seriko_is_no.1/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yu_Serizawa) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/芹澤優)

Yuu Serizawa is a voice actress and member of the anisong and idol unit [i☆Ris](https://anilist.co/staff/131442), signed to DIVE II Entertainment, a sub-label of Avex Entertainment. She is associated with the color blue in the unit.

**Non-anime roles:**
• Nina - Memento Mori (VG)
• Bay - NIKKE: Goddess of Victory (VG)
• Nicole - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)
• Gentildonna - Uma Musume: Pretty Derby (VG)
• Asakura Karen - Heaven Burns Red (VG)

__Birthplace:__ Kashiwa, Chiba Prefecture, Japan
__Height:__ 178cm

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Motsu_MC)__ | __[Tumblr](https://motsughettoblasta.tumblr.com/)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/motsu.mc)__

Segawa Mototaka, also known by his stage name motsu is a Japanese lyricist, composer and arranger. He is a former member of the bands [m.o.v.e](https://anilist.co/staff/101875) and [ALTIMA](https://anilist.co/staff/109511/ALTIMA).
DJ and rapper member of the japanese music group [TRF](https://anilist.co/staff/107303/TRF).
